game.name: Total War: ROME II -  Black Sea Colonies Culture Pack
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, 다운로드 가능한 콘텐츠, Steam 트레이딩 카드, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Total War: ROME II – Black Sea Colonies Culture PackThe Black Sea Colonies Culture Pack introduces three new playable factions into the ROME II Grand Campaign: Cimmeria, Pergamon and Colchis. Originally citizens of the Greek States, these pioneering peoples have settled far from home, intermingling
